column2: This one's about color, and exploration. Give it a shot! You can also launch it through the Desktop, if you want.
It's always interesting when people mash up art and games - see what you think.
Uh-oh! Looks like White House isn't installed! We need it installed before you can play the quest. Would you like me to install it for you?
Paint the town red (or green, or blue...) as you learn how CSS colors work in this low-key first-person adventure.
